Interface AuthService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthServiceImpl

    public interface AuthService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RegisteredUser createAdmin()
      creates administrator bootstrap account
      void createEntitlement(AccessToken accToken, java.lang.String userId, Entitlement role, java.util.List<Entitlement> permOrRoleList)
      method to create a new entry in the entitlementMap: userId - key, role - value; method restricted to admin only it adds services or roles to a role and associates a user id with this enriched role
      java.util.List<Entitlement> createListOfPermissions(java.lang.String serviceId)
      unrestricted method to create the list of Entitlement out of the auth service config file

      method to create new registered user and put it in registeredUsersMap; method restricted to admin only
      Service createService(AccessToken accToken, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.util.List<Entitlement> permiList)
      creates a new Service and if doesn't exist adds to the serviceMap; method restricted to admin only

      access method for the List of the credentials formatted as a string array

      this method logs in the user with valid credentials and generates accToken for him/her, this method considered to be the start point of user's session

      this method logs out the user by invalidating accToken, this method considered to be the end point of user's session

                                    java.lang.String userId)
                             throws AccessNotAllowedException
        method to create new registered user and put it in registeredUsersMap; method restricted to admin only

        accToken - - access token
        login - - user's login
        password - - user's password
        name - - registered user's name
        description - - description of user
        userId - - unique user's ID
        Returns:
        RegisteredUser
        Throws:
        AccessNotAllowedException - if access not allowed

                       Entitlement role,

        accToken - - token to be validated
        userId - - unique user's ID
        role - - new role to be set
        permOrRoleList - is List of Entitlements

        AccessNotAllowedException - if access is not allowed

      • login

        AccessToken login(java.lang.String login,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws LoginFailedException
        this method logs in the user with valid credentials and generates accToken for him/her, this method considered to be the start point of user's session
        Parameters:
        login - login string
        password - password string
        Returns:
        accToken access token
        Throws:
        LoginFailedException - if login fails

      • logout

        void logout(AccessToken accToken,
            java.lang.String login)
     throws LogoutFailedException
        this method logs out the user by invalidating accToken, this method considered to be the end point of user's session
        Parameters:
        accToken - access token
        login - login string
        Throws:
        LogoutFailedException - if logout fails

      • validateAccess

        java.lang.Boolean validateAccess(AccessToken accToken,
                                 java.lang.String permissionId)
        method to validate calls made by user to certain API Services' methods
        Parameters:
        accToken - access token
        permissionId - permission id string
        Returns:
        true if validation is successful, false if opposite
